parameters.query:
SELECT 
  'summary' AS source,
  [createdAt],
  [modifiedAt],
  [PdiWithScoringAvg],
  [Putt3ft],
  [Putt10ft],
  [Putt30ft],
  [Chip3yd],
  [Chip10yd],
  [Chip20yd],
  [Driver],
  [SixIronBFC],
  [BroadJump],
  [ASLRLeft],
  [ASLRRight],
  [DeepSquat],
  [SupineBridgeLeft],
  [SupineBridgeRight],
  [ScoringAverage]
FROM assessmentSummary
WHERE athleteProfileId = 1210

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'self' AS source,
  [createdAt],
  [modifiedAt],
  [PdiWithScoringAvg],
  [Putt3ft],
  [Putt10ft],
  [Putt30ft],
  [Chip3yd],
  [Chip10yd],
  [Chip20yd],
  [Driver],
  [SixIronBFC],
  [BroadJump],
  [ASLRLeft],
  [ASLRRight],
  [DeepSquat],
  [SupineBridgeLeft],
  [SupineBridgeRight],
  [ScoringAverage]
FROM assessmentSummarySelf
WHERE athleteProfileId = 1210

ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
